name: .BWZ File Extension
summary: Learn about .BWZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Batch configuration file created with WinImage, a disk image creation utility; contains settings that can be loaded into the WinImage Batch Assistant; used for automating the creation of multiple disk images.

content: To export a BWZ file from WinImage, click the Save... button in the lower-right corner of the Batch Assistant window.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
